Text:
function EP02_31()

    --.エピローグ-2【6月第4週】「一歩ずつ前へ」
    SaveData.Title = "一歩ずつ前へ"

    --//BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")

    
    --//BU：リラ（通常）、ヒユ（不満）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    
    PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav",0)

    MSG([[ The weekend when I became a 'Princess.' I was visiting Mask Senpai #3 who had twisted her ankle during the Princess Election appeal, together with Lira and Hiyu. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0240.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I mean, wasn't that stage fight exactly as planned? Why did you get hurt?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0456.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-well, because she showed up in weird clothes that were different from the plan, I got a bit flustered..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：３号（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA301aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "I thought appearing in a different outfit than usual... would make it easier to get serious... hehe." ]])

    MSG([[ I was genuinely surprised when the seniors appeared on stage. They had been in their usual outfits during rehearsals, but this time were dressed all in black. ]])

    MSG([[ As a result, during the “Fallen Leaves” move when I threw Mask Senpai #3, I misjudged the force. ]])

    MSG([[ Thankfully Ouga caught her backstage, or else it would have been a disaster. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0457.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I'm truly sorry for causing your injury... Please tell me anything I can do to help." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "A-anything...? Haa... haa..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0024.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "...Then peel an apple for me." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：リラ（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0241.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Wait, are you shy or what? You're the most confusing one of the three idiots." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0242.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Well, I’ll peel the apple for you. After all, I’m Erika’s chief knight." ]])

    --//BU：リラ（通常）、ヒユ（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01aa")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-400,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hya!? W-wait a minute! I won’t allow you to claim chief knight on your own!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0186.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I am the true chief knight! Since the entrance ceremony, I was the first to notice Erika Onee-sama’s charm!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0243.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Look at you acting all veteran. Actually, I was the first to officially sign the knight contract, and in cuteness, you and I are worlds apart. Like a rose and a weed, right? <sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0187.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "What did you say~~~~!? The bond between me and Erika Onee-sama is deeper than the Mariana Trench and stronger than diamonds! I won’t recognize you as a knight!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0244.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "You’re a weed, but you’re so arrogant! Compared to the bond I have with Erika, which was fought for seriously, your bond is just shallow wading!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：３号（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA301aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0025.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "Apple..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0458.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’ll peel it for you now." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ While Lira and the others were bickering, I quietly peeled the apple and fed it to Senpai. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：マリカの病室（昼）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ After visiting Senpai, I said I had some errands and parted ways with Lira and Hiyu, then visited another hospital room in the same hospital. ]])

    --//CI：眠るマリカ 005
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI005a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ As always, Marika Onee-san continued to sleep in that room. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",0)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0459.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hey, listen Marika Onee-san. Right now, I’m wearing your hand-me-down uniform and going to school in cross-dressing instead of Akira." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Then, I slowly and as thoroughly as possible recounted what had happened over the past three months. ]])

    MSG([[ About meeting people who knew Marika Onee-san. Hearing about Onee-san’s efforts as a 'Princess.' The efforts and struggles endured to become a 'Princess.' ]])

    MSG([[ There was no shortage of topics to talk about. Above all, I was desperate to tell Marika Onee-san about my experiences. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0460.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Trying to become a 'Princess' for the first time, I feel like I understand how Marika Onee-san felt." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0461.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Being someone’s goal... is really tough." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：マリカの病室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0462.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...And now, I finally became the same 'Princess' as Onee-san. Maybe I was able to catch up to her just a little bit." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0463.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’ll keep doing my best. I’ll show you more about what Marika Onee-san experienced at Yuriai Private Academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Suddenly I noticed the sunset shining through the window. It was about time to head home and prepare for tomorrow at the academy. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0464.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Well then, I’ll come visit again. Marika Onee-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I straightened Marika Onee-san’s sheets, gently brushed her messy hair, and left the hospital room. ]])

    -- 17	開演	第２章をクリアした
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(17)

    --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)


    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_01")

end
